entropy.configuration.resources

Class GetterBasedSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • entropy.configuration.resources.GetterBasedSpecification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceSpecification
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CPUConsSpecification, CPUCoresSpecification, MappedResourceSpecification, MemConsSpecification

    public abstract class GetterBasedSpecification
extends Object
implements ResourceSpecification
    resource specification based on the presence of getCapacity(Node) and getUse(VirtualMachine) methods
    Author:
    Guillaume Le LouÃ«t [guillaume.lelouet@gmail.com] 2013

      • toMap

        public static HashMap<String,ResourceSpecification> toMap(HashMap<String,ResourceSpecification> map,
                                          ResourceSpecification... res)
        add resource specifications to a (potential null) map
        Parameters:
        map - the map to add data inside, or null to create one
        res - the list of resource specifications. can be null or empty
        Returns:
        map if not null or a new map, into which specifications have been added

        public int[] getUses(VirtualMachine[] vms)
        Specified by:
        getUses in interface ResourceSpecification
        Parameters:
        vms - the vms to get the usages. Should not contain null values.
        Returns:
        the array of usages of this resource by the vms, such as ret[i]:=usage(vms[i])

        public int[] getCapacities(Node... nodes)
        Specified by:
        getCapacities in interface ResourceSpecification
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • toUses

        public Map<VirtualMachine,Integer> toUses()
        Specified by:
        toUses in interface ResourceSpecification
        Returns:
        a map of the usages of the vms. Should return a value even if a vm is not present.

        Specified by:

        Returns:
